00:00 Masters of the Universe
The new He-Man has been announced! Nicholas Galitzine will embody the iconic prince in the live-action movie adaptation of "Masters of the Universe".
https://kinocheck.com/news/cl4xcb

01:35 Just Cause
From the DCEU to the world of video game adaptations: "Blue Beetle" director Angel Manuel Soto will be in charge of an adaptation of the popular shooter "Just Cause".
https://kinocheck.com/news/gdgkv7

02:51 Blade Runner 2099
With "Blade Runner 2099", another sequel from the world of Ridley Scott's science fiction epic awaits us – this time in the form of a series. It has now been announced when filming will begin on the project starring Michelle Yeoh.
https://kinocheck.com/news/4sj9l4
